title: When exactly is ARURF going live?
body: I know ARURF is coming out in patch 9.2 but do we know exactly when it will be live?

replies.body: I would think in 4 days. It says that's when the events go live. Pretty annoying that the day the patch comes out, nothing changes at all
Wow that is really annoying, but thanks friend!
PLEASE SOMEONE ANSWER THE MAN, I JUST WANNA PLAY URF AND NOT HAVE 250 PING BECAUSE PBE IS BAD IN OCE
